ch.ethz.csb.youscope.shared
Interface YouScopeServer

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
YouScopeServerImpl
public interface YouScopeServer
extends java.rmi.Remote

Main Interface for the control of a microscope.

Author:
Moritz Lang

Method Summary
 void addMessageListener(YouScopeMessageListener listener)
          Adds a listener which detects new messages from the server/microscope.
 void addStateListener(MicroscopeStateListener listener)
          Adds a listener which detects state changes from the server/microscope.
 void emergencyStop()
          Stops the XY stage of the microscope and prevents ASAP any other thread to obtain access to the microscope.
 YouScopeServerConfiguration getConfiguration()
          Returns an interface representing the configuration of the microscope server.
 Measurement getCurrentMeasurement()
          Returns the currently running measurement or NULL, if none is running.
 JobFactory getJobFactory()
          Returns a factory for the construction of new jobs.
 MeasurementFactory getMeasurementFactory()
          Returns a factory for the construction of new measurements.
 Measurement[] getMeasurementQueue()
          Returns the currently queued measurements.
 Microscope getMicroscope()
          Returns an object allowing the access to the microscope.
 boolean isEmergencyStopped()
          Returns true if microscope is currently in the emergency-stop state.
 void removeMessageListener(YouScopeMessageListener listener)
          Removes a previously added listener.
 void removeStateListener(MicroscopeStateListener listener)
          Removes a previously added listener.
 void resetEmergencyStop()
          Resets the emergency-stop state, such that microscope can be accessed again.
 

Method Detail

getConfiguration

YouScopeServerConfiguration getConfiguration()
                                             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Returns an interface representing the configuration of the microscope server. All these settings will be saved between startups.

Returns:
The configuration interface.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

getMeasurementQueue

Measurement[] getMeasurementQueue()
                                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Returns the currently queued measurements. Remark: The current measurement is not included.

Returns:
Measurement queue.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

emergencyStop

void emergencyStop()
                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Stops the XY stage of the microscope and prevents ASAP any other thread to obtain access to the microscope.

Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

resetEmergencyStop

void resetEmergencyStop()
                        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Resets the emergency-stop state, such that microscope can be accessed again.

Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

isEmergencyStopped

boolean isEmergencyStopped()
                           throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Returns true if microscope is currently in the emergency-stop state.

Returns:
TRUE if emergency-stopped.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
